summary: A man signs up for a test trial of a new anti-depressant as a way to change his life. When the trial is called off, he continues taking the medication with violent results.
cast: Ulrich Thomsen|Paprika Steen|Emma Sehested Høeg|Lars Brygmann|Stine Stengade|Josephine Märcher Sandig|Bodil Udsen|Bjarne Henriksen|Ole Boisen|Henrik Prip|Jakob Fals Nygaard|Morten Hauch-Fausbøll|Charlotte Juul|Elsebeth Nielsen|Kim Westi|Michael Jensen|Ellen Nyman|Ulrika Sabroe|Søren Malling|Silja Amalie Bjerregaard|Tine Bojanna Bjerregaard
title: Den du frygter
